original_text: God made the wild animals according to their kinds, the livestock according to their kinds, and all the creatures that move along the ground according to their kinds. And God saw that it was good.
korean_text: 하나님이 땅의 짐승을 그 종류대로, 가축을 그 종류대로, 땅에 기는 모든 것을 그 종류대로 만드시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: God made the wild animals according to their kinds
the livestock according to their kinds
and all the creatures that move along the ground according to their kinds
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅에 기는 모든 생물들을 그 종류대로 만드셨다

sentences.original_text: And God saw that it was good
